body_html: We do depend on cudaPointerGetAttributes pretty heavily, so unless the driver APIs don't tag the pointers correctly, you won't be able to wrap them into tensors. Is there any reason why you can't use the runtime API? Also, all other driver functions should be ok to use (we use some of them internally too).

body: We do depend on `cudaPointerGetAttributes` pretty heavily, so unless the driver APIs don't tag the pointers correctly, you won't be able to wrap them into tensors. Is there any reason why you can't use the runtime API? Also, all other driver functions should be ok to use (we use some of them internally too).
